records.subcategory:
### Attorney Fees (CRS § 24-72-204)
**Entitlement Standards:**
- Requester substantially prevailed
-
records.description:
### Attorney Fees (CRS § 24-72-204)
**Entitlement Standards:**
- Requester substantially prevailed
- Litigation was necessary to obtain records
- Custodian's denial was not substantially justified
